Name: Encounter: Jazzmondius
Description: Before the game begins, search the encounter deck for Jazzmondius and put it onto the field.

Name: Jazzmondius
Description:
After you play an action that damages this enemy, it attacks.
This enemy does not attack during the night's attack step.
If this enemy would be discarded, shuffle it into the encounter deck instead.

Name: Fill With Despair
Description:
Jazzmondius attacks X times, where X is half the number of cards on your partner's field, rounded up.
Discard each card on your field.

Name: Shadowjazz
Description:
Effects that cause Jazzmondius to attack also cause this enemy to attack.
This enemy does not attack during the night's attack step.

Name: Growing Storm
Description:
Before time passes, you discard a card from your hand.

Name: Hawk Lord's Servant
